success.title: Survey completed successfully
success.text1: Thank you very much for participating.
success.text2: Your opinion is very important to us.

error.title: Error
error.text1: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

brand.name: Inquiro
brand.description: We help organisations turn feedback into action. Inquiro enables you to design and launch surveys, collect responses in real time, visualise results with clear dashboards, and generate AI-driven recommendations so teams can make confident, data-based decisions faster.
